name: LATVIAN TRASH KILLA.vanila
description: The game has simple goal of destroying multi type of trash before it reaches your sweet gramma house. The game is made up of an existing 9 to 5 every day, same on, same on garbage CEO responsibility tasks.  The Miskastino is your dream body robot, shaped of the 2 muscular handsome hands and torso every mum would want her husband to have.  The player will have to use Miskastino to deal with hi-grade tasks of sorting all of the trash in correct containers. This wouldn’t clear the world from plastic pollution problems, but at-least you will feel like you did your part. The game continues, to generate more different trash and the difficulties rises as the game is being played.
